reviewText: The best AT her best! Wish it were released on DVD.
This VHS is in very good condition and played beautifully.  This artist is one of my very favorites and the quality of the sound was great!
This was to replace the tape that was worn out from use. It came quicker that I thought and I took it to the nursing home I do activities in and they loved it.

90 minutes of concert footage from the 1986 Sandi Patti concert tour that was called "Let There Be Praise!" (taped from the Dallas, Texas concert tour stop), released by Word on VHS in America in 1987. This tour featured most of the songs on Sandi's (then new) album "Morning Like This". The production values on this video are very high and this is, more or less, the precise sights and sounds of a filled Sandi concert hall in the 1980's. A Morning Like This
